imdb.plot outline: "VANGUARD" is a webseries about the birth of the modern superhero. Years ago an evolutionary shift occurred in select members of the new generation, and when modern societal pressures ensued, the fledgeling heroes turned to the shadows and fled from their homes. Now, only a few years into their abilities, the first ever group of newly evolved young adults converges together in one room. Now fully aware of each other and their abilities, their worlds have become far more dangerous. Relationships are formed, traitors are seeded, Heroes are created, and Villains are born.
imdb.title: Vanguard
plot: Young fledgling superheroes find themselves in both personal and physical peril as their powers are revealed to an unforgiving world.::Chris Sheffield

"VANGUARD" is a webseries about the birth of the modern superhero. Years ago an evolutionary shift occurred in select members of the new generation, and when modern societal pressures ensued, the fledgeling heroes turned to the shadows and fled from their homes. Now, only a few years into their abilities, the first ever group of newly evolved young adults converges together in one room. Now fully aware of each other and their abilities, their worlds have become far more dangerous. Relationships are formed, traitors are seeded, Heroes are created, and Villains are born.::Chris Sheffield
